Summary: Sorta round - kinda redish lights- not real bright.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Harlem
There were no other sightings in Harlem on or around August 1st 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down BradMary Lake Rd one evening in earl Aug. 2005 And off to the left I saw a sphere like object hoovering just above tree line. It was strange because it seemed to spin in 2 directions both around and over (if that makes sense). Anyway I stopped the car and watched it~ it did not last long 15 sec. or so. Then it just DISAPPEARED! and it made NO SOUND AT ALL! I kinda coughed it up to Fort Gordon property backing up to mine~ maybe this was a man made object~ I don't know~ but I know I did SEE it what ever it was.
